name: Zeek
description:
Zeek is a survival game. Once started you will be placed in an island where you will have to fight for living. Monsters will come after every 200 seconds which you have to craft and get resources. Full completion of the game takes about 40 minutes. Enjoy!

Should you have any problems/suggestions email to: zeeksupp@gmail.com

(This is my first game)

Be sure to check out my other games for better content

Made by Gw1p
